name: Rattle Bots
description:
Rattle Bots is a 2D game of robot battling, seen from a top-down perspective. You build your very own battle bot, battle a variety of different opponents with it and use your price money to buy a collection of different parts to upgrade your robot with.

Brought to you by KR Games, we hope you enjoy our little game, robots, rat girls, mayhem and all!
